export var LOGIN_SUCCESS='LOGIN_SUCCESS';export var LOGIN_FAILURE='LOGIN_FAILURE';export var LOGOUT_REQUEST='LOGOUT_REQUEST';export var LOGOUT_SUCCESS='LOGOUT_SUCCESS';export function receiveLogin(){return{type:LOGIN_SUCCESS};}function loginError(payload){return{type:LOGIN_FAILURE,payload:payload};}function requestLogout(){return{type:LOGOUT_REQUEST};}export function receiveLogout(){return{type:LOGOUT_SUCCESS};}// logs the user out
export function logoutUser(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(requestLogout());localStorage.removeItem('authenticated');dispatch(receiveLogout());};}export function loginUser(creds){return function(dispatch){dispatch(receiveLogin());if(creds.email.length>0&&creds.password.length>0){localStorage.setItem('authenticated',true);}else{dispatch(loginError('Something was wrong. Try again'));}};}
